DOC.brief_summary: The pathogenesis nonalcoholic fatty liver disease fully elucidate . The widely support theory implicates insulin resistance key mechanism lead hepatic steatosis , perhaps also steatohepatitis . Selenoprotein P ( SeP ) secretory protein primarily produce liver . Previous study demonstrate SeP , liver-derived secretory protein , cause insulin resistance . Therefore , purpose study determine different Sep level healthy normal group NAFLD group .
DOC.brief_title: Selenoprotein P Non-alcoholic Fatty Liver Disease
DOC.criteria: Healthy volunteer visit routine medical check clinic History cardiovascular disease ( myocardial infarction , unstable angina , cardiovascular revascularization ) Diabetes Hypertension Malignancy Severe renal hepatic disease Subjects take medication might affect body weight body composition
